p: The solvents methanol, petroleum ether, and dichloromethane; the reagents DPPH •, Folin and Ciocalteu's phenol, TPTZ, 20 mM iron(III) chloride solution, sodium acetate, acetic acid, sodium carbonate, sodium nitrite, aluminium chloride, and sodium hydroxide; and the standards used, ascorbic acid, catechin, gallic acid, and Trolox were purchased from Sigma-Aldrich (Taufkirchen, Germany). The standard rutin was purchased from Tokyo Chemical Industry (Tokyo, Japan). DMSO was purchased from Santa Cruz (Heidelberg, Germany).
